CARDINAL . Until DATE criminal - law matters were governed by LAW Soviet Federative Socialist Republic . From DATE the old Code was replaced by LAW ( CCP ) .

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL of the new ORG establishes the rule of impermissibility of disclosing data from the preliminary investigation . Under paragraph CARDINAL of the LAW , information from the investigation file may be divulged only with the permission of a prosecutor or investigator and only in so far as it does not infringe the rights and lawful interests of the participants in the criminal proceedings and does not prejudice the investigation . Divulging information about the private life of participants in criminal proceedings without their permission is prohibited .
